description.translate: All it takes is a speck of dust, a drop, a hint, to reveal nature.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Ultime Skéléo\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Il suffit d'un grain de poussière, d'une goutte,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'un soupçon, pour révéler nature.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7All it takes is a speck of dust, a drop,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7a hint, to reveal nature.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a4\"}"]}}
